ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those that revive by quickening,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and raise (clouds) and scatter them around,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by (the angels) spreading (the words of God) far and wide,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then by oath of those that lift and carry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Which scatter clouds to their destined places,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By those which cause earth's vegetation to revive;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by those who publish [the Divine messages] far and wide,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the winds that scatter clouds and rain;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:3] by the sweeping spreaders, [by] the winds that scatter the rains;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By those which cause earth's vegetation to revive) and He swore by the rain, i.e. He swore by the clouds from which comes the rain; it is also said: this refers to the angels who spread the Scripture;
